title: "Sugar Sack Weights 80th percentile"

Use the [data from tinyurl.com/M221-dist-shapes](https://tinyurl.com/M221-dist-shapes) to calculate the 80th percentile of sugar sack weights.

<details>

<summary>Possible Solution</summary>

``` excel
=PERCENTILE(B:B,0.8)
```

The 80th percentile of sugar sack weights is 10.093.
